content.en: Hydrological modeling: Scientists are using the SWAT model, combined with the SUFI-2 algorithm, to accurately predict and simulate streamflow in various river basins around the world. The SUFI-2 algorithm is being used for model calibration, uncertainty analysis, sensitivity analysis, and validation. This combination of the SWAT model and the SUFI-2 algorithm allows researchers to better understand and analyze hydrological processes, water balance, and sediment flow in different regions, helping to improve water resource management and planning.
content.da: Hydrologisk modellering: Forskere bruger SWAT-modellen kombineret med SUFI-2-algoritmen til præcist at forudsige og simulere vandføring i forskellige flodbassiner rundt om i verden. SUFI-2-algoritmen anvendes til modelkalibrering, usikkerhedsanalyse, følsomhedsanalyse og validering. Denne kombination af SWAT-modellen og SUFI-2-algoritmen gør det muligt for forskere bedre at forstå og analysere hydrologiske processer, vandbalance og sedimentstrøm i forskellige regioner, hvilket hjælper med at forbedre forvaltningen og planlægningen af vandressourcer.
